Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators

Translations.Text: wo de mingling zhishi kuai ru zhuanshun de yiju hua
Wo que yi jiang nimen de zongpai huimiele. You jieshou quangao de ren ma
Fan tamen suo zuo de shi, dou jizai zai tian jing zhong
Yiqie xiaoshi he dashi, dou shi bei jilu de
Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan li, zai guangming zhong
zai quanneng de zhu nali, de ju yige ruyi di diwei.§
Zhiren zhu
ceng jiaoshou “gulanjing”
ta chuangzaole ren
bing jiao ren xiuci
Ri yue shi yi dingshu er yunxing de
Caomu shi shuncong ta de yizhi de
Ta ceng jiang tian sheng qi. Ta ceng guiding gongping
yimian nimen yong cheng bugong
Nimen yingdang binggong di jin shou heng du, nimen buyao shi suo cheng zhi wu fenliang buzu
Ta wei zhongsheng er jiang dadi fangxia
Da dishang you shuiguo he you hua bi di hai zao
yu you gan de wugu he xiangcao
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
Ta ceng yong taoqi ban de gan tu chuangzao ren
ta yong huoyan chuangzao jingling
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne
